title: A good river view
review: It was near by our hotel. the Bridge is good. The river view is also very beautiful. you can spend a few hours with peace enjoying the water.

title: Take a break on your trip
review: You can take a break here on your travel from nainital to Almora. Do not come just for this place from nainital. There is a hanging bridge and a canteen which has some activities mentioned n all, but the highlight is the huge frog shaped rock in the river below.!

title: Suspended atop the Kosi river
review: Suspension bridge or Frog's point is a bridge with suspension tied through the iron cables atop Kosi river gives you good views of the river.

title: Nice Bridge
review: It was nice suspension bridge...nothing great.... but the surrounding was quite picturesque. One can enjoy river.

title: A Bridge of Hope in between Ramnagar City & Haldwani city
review: This bridge is on the river of Koshi Nadi which is known as hope of life to the people of Ramnagar & its peripheral areas specially people of Uttarakhand. This is a very old bridge and support the agriculture land by irrigation through its canal moves from this bridge.

title: a average old British bridge
review: it a very old bridge on river koshi in uttarakhand ... it is near garjiya town .. now days many local tourists here  as it offers a area where u can have fun near river and many adventure activities are organised by locals on the bridge

title: Tourist spot
review: If you are tourist you wiould wanna go here to tick mark the list. There is nothing great about the bridge, just that it is famous in the area.

title: Hanging Bridge on Local Shipra River
review: Hanging Bridge, breeze winds, passing river, frog shape rock all looks great, just passing and halt to see these above said things, relax here via river water and take some pics and then start journey onward Ranikhet.

title: cool..
review: its on the way to Ranikhet and Kainchi dham...theres a frog shaped rock and this bridge thus called frog point...

title: Awesome view
review: On the way to nainital, this is a huge suspension bridge which gives some great view of the flowing kosi river... An attraction for tourists

title: Old Bridge- great views
review: This is old Bridge over a river used by the locals. Nothing great and not on tourists map. You can enjoy views and go down and enjoy near river. Great for photography.

title: Average View
review: You need to walk for at least around more than 1 kilometer , The view was not worth for the pain we took to walk there .

title: Good for a break while u travel
review: Not worth coming all the way from Nanital, but if you are going or coming from Almora then it is a good place if you like to jump on the bridge. Nice view of the river , Kosi flow. Also rocks which are in frog shape. There is a also a tea stall and an adventure shop for river crossing and rappelling. We did not take it. Rishikesh is much better place

title: Its just a bridge
review: it's not worth visiting the place as its too far from the city.

title: Great Morning Trek
review: The bridge is about 1.5 Km from the hotels and a good walking distance early in the morning helps you to have great head start for the day.

title: Drop in if you are in the area
review: This is just another long and old suspension bridge..one shouldn't plan a trip just for the bridge but do drop in on the way if you are in this area.

title: so so
review: I havevisited this place 2nd time this year buttherewas no crowd in month of october ...it is better to visit these places in peak season as no activity was happening there

title: nothing different
review: this is like any other suspension bridge. We were here on our way to the Girja temple. Almost 1.5 km long, you can see an amazing view of the Kosi river from here. If you come out here, just to see this bridge, you will be fairly disappointed since there is nothing much to see

title: On the way to Girja Temple
review: This is just another long and old suspension bridge on the way to girja temple. The view of the Kosi River and the hills surrounding is majestic but don't come for any other thrills

title: Visit if you have surplus time
review: This bridge although very similar to any suspension bridge, yet the landscape and beauty around this place is very good. This is little far away from the main city. The rocks below the bridge and the river (River Ramganga) flowing beneath looks great.

title: A must visit attraction in Dhikuli
review: This is 120 yrs old suspension bridge over Kosi river near the near Garjiya Temple, Ramnagar, Uttarakhand, India. This bridge is very picturesque and livid place. Away from city hustle & bustle , the chirping of birds and gurgling water of River Kosi is just awesome. There are also some person who offers adventure activities like river crossing,Rappeling etc on the adventure bridge.

title: Trip to Jim corbett
review: The swimming pools were big enough and kids just enjoyed spending hours in the pool playing water games, volley ball and relaxing in the pool. Adventure and fun activities for adults (flying fox, tug of war, team building exercises) and Drawing competition, racing competition for kids, Tambola, Folk dance in the evening and DJ night for party lovers and KARAOKE night for finding the singer in you….I must say the wholesome family experience it was. Something or the other for everyone.
